docblock.description: WSystem.php
WSystem keeps the session, template and database instances as singletons
docblock.long-description:
If you need the WSession instance, just call : 

WSystem::getSession();
It's the same thing with WTemplate andWDatabase.

docblock.description: WTemplateCompiler
docblock.long-description:
Nodes

Each

{exemple}

is called a "node". In this case, "exemple" is the name of the node. For a closing node, such as

{/exemple}

, the node name is "exemple_close".

docblock.description: List of tags opened so that we can check there is no jam in opening and closing the nodes
